tasks.task: Responding to a pesticide spill on the farm
subtasks: Identify the location and extent of the spill immediately
Gather sand or sawdust from the spill kit
Contain the spill by spreading the absorbent material
Absorb the liquid without spreading it further
Prevent contamination of other surfaces or ground
Seal the collected material in a plastic bag
Label the bag for proper disposal
Visit the CDC website for information on pesticide safety
Check appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) requirements
